name: Manor Run
description:
Welcome to the Manor!

So, you have decided to explorer the dark corners of this twisted house. Very well...

Here are some things you should know:

  • How to move, of course. Turn around with 4 and 6, step forward with 8 (numpad)
  • Cycle through items, press "*" on your numpad
  • Found a door? Open it with 0 (numpad)
  • Did you find the music box? great! use with 5. It will point left / right / up / down towards the DARKNESS
  • Compass? it will guide you to the exit
  • Dead for no apparently reason? Maybe something was expecting you from the corner
  • Can't see anything? Use the candle!
  • Oh, and don't forget to look for the key!!

Game made for the Nokia Jam #3, made in one week from scratch.

Feel free to contact me!
